snippet: Former Senator Chuck Hagel is accused by members of his own party of being anti-Israel, antigay and soft on Iran.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates Chuck Hagel as his choice for defense secretary during his second term; sets in motion White House campaign that officials predict will overcome accusations that Republican former senator from Nebraska is anti-Israel, antigay and soft on Iran.

byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear, Jeff Zeleny and Scott Shane contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Former Senator Chuck Hagel is accused by members of his own party of being anti-Israel, antigay and soft on Iran.

headline.seo: Obama Nominates Hagel for Defense Post
headline.main: In Fending Off Critics, Obama Points to Hagel as Vietnam War Hero
headline.print_headline: In Fending Off Critics, Obama Points to Hagel As Vietnam War Hero

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
